definition: to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: If seller's designs are used, the design numbers must be stated in full.
sentences.chinese: 若选用卖方花样，必须详细注明花号。

sentences.english: The developer claims that this game has been a top-seller on wireless and on retail platforms.
sentences.chinese: 开发商声称，这场比赛已顶级无线和卖方的零售平台。

sentences.english: On the other hand, you might get ripped off since you don't know the seller .
sentences.chinese: 在另一方面，你可能会被敲竹杠，因为你不知道卖方。

sentences.english: During the warranty period, if the product fails, the sellers will do minor repairs for the product.
sentences.chinese: 若产品在保固期内失效时，则卖方为产品做小修。

sentences.english: The age of the carrying vessel chartered by the Seller shall not
sentences.chinese: 卖方所租载货船只船龄不得超过15年。

sentences.english: The difference between the two is the bank’s fee and profit.
sentences.chinese: 买方和卖方之间的差额就是银行的费用和利润。

sentences.english: But sellers want to offload their risk as well.
sentences.chinese: 但是，卖方也想卸下风险。

sentences.english: The Seller should record the configuration state of each product in the product inspection summary.
sentences.chinese: 卖方在产品检查记要中要记录每个产品的配置。

sentences.english: All bank charges outside China will be on the account of the Sellers.
sentences.chinese: 所有中国之外的银行费用均由卖方承担。

sentences.english: As a rule, the buyers ought to bear the charges of packing.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，包装费由卖方负担。

sentences.english: Seller sends hard copy of BG/SBLC via bank-bonded courier.
sentences.chinese: 卖方通过银行专递发送硬拷贝。

sentences.english: These requirements are considerably more flexible than those provided under (the law of the country of the Seller).
sentences.chinese: 那些要件要比卖方地点国的法令的规定矫捷很多。

sentences.english: Buyer issues LOI along with NCND to the Seller.
sentences.chinese: 买方向卖方出具意向书和保密协议。

sentences.english: The Seller shall do all jobs of contacting the transportation company.
sentences.chinese: 联系运输公司的各项工作完全由卖方承担。

sentences.english: A new buyer-seller watermarking protocol without the third party was proposed, which used the idea of secret sharing and homomorphic public key cryptosystem.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种新的无第三方参与的买方卖方水印协议。

sentences.english: I mean what would the control authority do with the domestic currency owned by foreigners?
sentences.chinese: 我的意思是管汇当局是外汇的惟一买方和卖方。

definition: to transfer ownership (of a vehicle, securities etc)/(real estate) conveyancing
borrower/leaser/the hiring side of a contract
developer (of real estate, a commercial product etc)
to defer payment/to pay back over long term
